law.catch_line: The General Assembly finds that radiation:...

text.section:
The General Assembly finds that radiation:
If used properly, can help to improve the health, welfare, and productivity of the public;
If used carelessly or excessively, may destroy life or health; and
If used improperly, may impair the industrial and agricultural potential of this State.

It is the policy of this State:
To encourage the constructive uses of radiation; and
To control radiation.
